Dialog_confirmform_data.CHECK_PASSENGER_DATA_MESSAGE: Before proceeding, please ensure all passenger information is correct.

Dialog_alert_offers_seat.TITLE: You can purchase additional seats
Dialog_alert_offers_seat.MESSAGE: Other passengers can still select seats, with fees depending on the seat type.

Dialog_alert_exit.ALERT_EXIT_TITLE: You’ve chosen an emergency exit row seat.
Dialog_alert_exit.MESSAGE: To travel in this seat you must:
Dialog_alert_exit.MESSAGE_2: Be able to understand the instructions given by the flight attendant.
Dialog_alert_exit.MESSAGE_3: Have sufficient mobility, strength and dexterity to operate the emergency exit, i.e. must be able bodied.
Dialog_alert_exit.MESSAGE_4: Did not request for wheelchair service.
Dialog_alert_exit.MESSAGE_5: Be able to visually determine if the exit is safe to open.
Dialog_alert_exit.MESSAGE_6: Not require special handling or the use of a mobility aid or medical device.
Dialog_alert_exit.MESSAGE_7: Not be solely responsible for another person.
Dialog_alert_exit.MESSAGE_8: Not have condition that might cause them bodily harm by operating the exit.
Dialog_alert_exit.MESSAGE_9: Not require a seatbelt extension extender as this presents a tripping hazard.
Dialog_alert_exit.MESSAGE_10: Did not request for wheelchair service.

Dialog_alert_select_seat.TITLE: Please select your seat
Dialog_alert_select_seat.MESSAGE: Because your selected add-on package includes free seat selection at no extra cost.

Dialog_alert_select_seat_not_enough.TITLE: Seat Selection Incomplete
Dialog_alert_select_seat_not_enough.MESSAGE_FIRST: Some passengers haven’t selected their seats yet.
Dialog_alert_select_seat_not_enough.MESSAGE_SECOND: Please review and select seats for everyone.

Dialog_alert_select_seat_not_include_pac.TITLE: Premium Seat Selection Not Included
Dialog_alert_select_seat_not_include_pac.MESSAGE: Your current seat package only covers Nok Happy Seats. If you choose Nok Premium Seat Front Row or Nok Premium Seat, you’ll need to pay the full seat selection fee.
